thread.section_title: Mavis Discount Tire Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mavis Discount Tire | mavistire.com
thread.title: John Bathe
thread.title_full: Mavis Discount Tire reviewed by John Bathe

author: John Bathe
title: John Bathe
text: I took my car in for an oil change today, and I will be bringing my car and my wife's car as long as we have them. I have had work done here before, my wife was having problems with her car when the alarm kept going off every 15 minutes. When she took her car to be checked she was told it could be anything and the fix could be expensive. They had her for for most of the day and could not find anything, when she went to pick it up they did not charge her anything since they could not find anything. They even called Toyota for guidance. I was impressed before this happened and when I mentioned it to the technician today he remembered it was a Toyota and that they checked everything. I don't know man companies that would have done this so since I found them I am sticking with them.
